_description.iso_639_3_eng: Genetic indices for 3 species calculated from SPET genotype data (Abies alba, Pinus halepensis) and 4TREE Axiom assay (Thermo Fisher Scientific, USA, Pinus pinaster), calculated in December 2021 and submitted as FORGENIUS deliverable D4.3. Various programmes were used to calculate the indices: GenePop v. 4.7.5, BayeScan v. 2.1, and methods described in Archambeau (2022), PhD thesis, and González-Martínez et al. (2017), Current Biology.

std_dataset_markers.chr_GenoTech: Only SNPs with high-quality scoring following the Best Practices Workflow implemented in the Axiom™ Analysis Suite v5.2 were selected and filtered by missing data (<30%).  Index estimated with GenePop v. 4.7.5 .

Only SNPs with high-quality scoring following the Best Practices Workflow implemented in the Axiom™ Analysis Suite v5.2 were selected and filtered by missing data (<30%). SNP annotation based on SnpEff v5.1 was retrieved from Piñeiro et al. (2023).

Only SNPs with high-quality scoring following the Best Practices Workflow implemented in the Axiom™ Analysis Suite v5.2 were selected and filtered by missing data (<30%). Alculated following Archambeau (2022), PhD thesis.
SPET array. Index estimated as pairwise nucleotide diversity (π) for total sites using VCFtools software and correcting by the average length of sequence covered by the SPET assay.
